title: "City 372"
marks: Signature, Title, and Mark bottom margin LR, in pencil: [Risaburo Kimakura];
description: abstract cityscape: arrangements of brilliantly colored, saturated squares of red, yellow, purple, blue, green, and brown throughout; squares are arranged in chevron pattern at upper center, punctuated by monolith shape of red, yellow, and blue panels; bright green background; rows of squares form colorful building shapes in bottom quadrat; taller monolithic buildings with red, yellow, green, and purple panels in lower center; blue background at bottom with zigzagged yellow and green form at LR
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Harvey Gross via the Morikami Museum and Japanese Gardens
